short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate and display margin and profit for Shopify products

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Shopify VAT Margin Calculator is a powerful tool designed to simplify profit margin calculations for Shopify store owners, especially those dealing with VAT (Value Added Tax). This Chrome extension seamlessly integrates with your Shopify admin interface, providing real-time margin and profit calculations as you adjust product prices and costs.
